rules: Rule1: If "Savage Plains" wins a documentary award, then the director secures funding for the next project
Rule2: "Savage Plains" wins a documentary award or "Savage Plains" receives a high audience rating score
Rule3: If "Savage Plains" receives a high audience rating score, then "Savage Plains" completes production
Rule4: The production violates drone usage regulations or if "Savage Plains" wins a documentary award, then the television network airs the "Savage Plains" episode
Rule5: If the production receives a warning from the regulatory body, then the production does not face a fine from the regulatory body
Rule6: If the director gains recognition from industry peers, then the television network airs the "Savage Plains" episode
Rule7: If the director secures funding for the next project, then the director gains recognition from industry peers
Rule8: If the crew has camera drone equipment, then if "Savage Plains" does not complete production, the production receives government grant funding
Rule9: If the camera drone captures footage of the elephant herd, then "Savage Plains" completes production
Rule10: The camera drone captures footage of the elephant herd or the camera drone captures footage of the lion pride
Rule11: If the production obtains a permit from the wildlife reserve, then if the camera drone captures footage of the lion pride, "Savage Plains" completes production
Rule12: If the network executive approves the final cut content, then the editor edits the elephant sequence footage
Rule13: The network executive approves the final cut content or the network executive requests changes to the final cut
Rule14: If the network executive requests changes to the final cut, then if the production does not obtain a permit from the wildlife reserve, then the production hires a local guide consultant
Rule15: If it is not the case that if "Savage Plains" does not complete production then the production receives government grant funding, then the production faces a fine from the regulatory body

Rule16: If it is not the case that if "Savage Plains" does not complete production then the production receives government grant funding, then the production receives a warning from the regulatory body
facts: Fact1: The crew has camera drone equipment
Fact2: The production does not receive government grant funding
Fact3: The television network does not air the "Savage Plains" episode
Fact4: The production does not violate drone usage regulations
Fact5: The production does not hire a local guide consultant
Fact6: The editor does not edit the elephant sequence footage
